titles.title: Don't Worry, Just Pray - Wanda Cummings

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Don't worry, don't worry, just pray. x2
For the Lord is on his throne
He'll not leave you alone.
So, don't worry, don't worry, just pray

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh, don't worry, don't worry, just pray x2
Our God is in control and He will make you whole
So, Don't worry, don't worry, just pray

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
....He'll give strength for today
and guide you all the way.....

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
....For God's hand is upon you
and he will see you through.....
